content: Does anyone know code/solution/resource to convert HL7 DFT-Detail Financial Transaction to FHIR resource?

There is a v2-to-FHIR project but we haven't tackled DFT yet. General details are available at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/OO/2-To-FHIR+Project or on the v2-to-FHIR Zulip stream. We're in the process of mapping some of the DFT segments (PID, PV1, etc) but haven't gotten to all of them yet. If you're working on a DFT transformation we'd happily take your input and add it to the larger project.

@Craig Newman I have done mapping of FT1 with ChargeItem when FT1-6 == "CG" (Charge).
However, in case of other values in FT1-6 i.e. (Credit, Payment, Co-payment etc), I don't find it relevant to use ChargeItem resource.
Request your feedback on this if that's correct understanding.
Thanks
Unfortunately, I don't know much about FT1 (or financial transactions in general). There if a Financial stream that might have the expertise you need.
Thank you @Craig Newman for the response. I have posted the query in Financial channel.
